original_text: For the priest's lips should keep knowledge, and they should seek the law at his mouth: for he is the messenger of the Lord of hosts.
korean_text: 제사장의 입술은 지식을 지켜야 하겠고 사람들은 그의 입에서 율법을 구하게 되어야 할 것이니 제사장은 만군의 여호와의 사자가 됨이거늘

sentences.original_text: For the priest's lips should keep knowledge
and they should seek the law at his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 입에서 율법을 구해야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: for he is the messenger of the Lord of hosts
